General.Name: New Guomai Digital Culture Co Ltd
General.Description: New Guomai Digital Culture Co., Ltd. engages in digital content, digital intelligence application, metaverse cloud platform, physical scene, and digital assets businesses. It offers video production, digital intelligence party building, digital intelligence enterprise service, and integration and expansion; and digital human generation, digital design, digital modeling, digital space interaction, virtual shooting and other professional services. The company also engages in hotel business and digital marketing services. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Shanghai, China. New Guomai Digital Culture Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of China Telecom Group Co., Ltd.

1.Name: Mr. Li  Peizhong
1.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
